com.ibm.team.interop.client.rest
Interface IInteropRestClient

All Known Subinterfaces:
IInteropAdminRestClient
public interface IInteropRestClient

Client library interface for the Interop REST service.

Since:
0.7

Nested Class Summary
static interface IInteropRestClient.IAuthenticator
          Authenticator callback which must be provided by clients.

Method Detail

shutdown

void shutdown()
Terminate use of this connection, freeing all associated resources. No methods that would attempt to communicate with the server can be called after this method has been called.

createExternalProxy

IRestExternalProxy createExternalProxy()
Create a new ExternalProxy object in memory only. After setting properties on the object, it can be saved using IInteropRestClient.saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy, URI, IRestExternalState)

Returns:
a new, in-memory ExternalProxy object

getExternalProxy

IRestExternalProxy getExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy)
                                    throws InteropClientException
Get the latest state of an ExternalProxy object, given a previously-fetched state.

Parameters:
externalProxy - a previously-fetched ExternalProxy object; must not be null
Returns:
the latest state of the ExternalProxy object from the server; never null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

findExternalProxy

IRestExternalProxy findExternalProxy(java.net.URI externalURI)
                                     throws InteropClientException
Find an ExternalProxy object with an associated external URI.

Parameters:
externalURI - the URI to find the ExternalProxy object for; must not be null
Returns:
the ExternalProxy object associated with the URI, or null if none found
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

saveExternalProxy

void saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy)
                       throws InteropClientException
Update an ExternalProxy object. This method can only be used to update an existing object, since a new object must be associated with an external URI. Use IInteropRestClient.saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy, URI, IRestExternalState) to save a new object.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to update; must not be a new item; must not be null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

saveExternalProxy

void saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy,
                       java.net.URI externalURI,
                       IRestExternalState externalState)
                       throws InteropClientException
Save a newly-created ExternalProxy object, associating it with an external URI. Optional external state may also be saved at the same time. If external state is also being saved, then incoming synchronization will be triggered.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to save; must be a new item; must not be null
externalURI - the external URI to associate with the ExternalProxy object; must not be null
externalState - optional ExternalState object to associate with the ExternalProxy object; may be a new or modified item; may be null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

saveExternalProxy

void saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy,
                       java.net.URI externalURI,
                       boolean doSync)
                       throws InteropClientException
Save an ExternalProxy object, optionally associating it with an external URI (if it's new), and specifying whether incoming synchronization should be triggered.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to save; must not be null
externalURI - the external URI to associate with the ExternalProxy object; if not null, the ExternalProxy object must be a new item
doSync - if true, schedule incoming synchronization for the proxy
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

deleteExternalProxy

void deleteExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy)
                         throws InteropClientException
Delete an ExternalProxy object. Any associated ExternalState object is also deleted.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to delete; must have been fetched from the server previously; must not be null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

createExternalState

IRestExternalState createExternalState()
Create a new ExternalState object in memory only. After setting properties on the object, it can be saved using IInteropRestClient.saveExternalState(IRestExternalState) or IInteropRestClient.saveExternalProxy(IRestExternalProxy, URI, IRestExternalState)

Returns:
a new, in-memory ExternalState object

getExternalState

IRestExternalState getExternalState(IRestExternalState externalState)
                                    throws InteropClientException
Get the latest state of an ExternalState object, given a previously-fetched state.

Parameters:
externalState - a previously-fetched ExternalState object; must not be null
Returns:
the latest state of the ExternalState object from the server; never null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getExternalState

IRestExternalState getExternalState(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy)
                                    throws InteropClientException
Get the ExternalState object associated with an ExternalProxy object, if any.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to get the associated ExternalState object for; must have been previously fetched from the server
Returns:
the associated ExternalState object, or null if none
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

findExternalState

IRestExternalState findExternalState(java.net.URI externalURI)
                                     throws InteropClientException
Find any ExternalState object associated with an external URI (via an associated ExternalProxy object).

Parameters:
externalURI - the URI to find the ExternalState object for; must not be null
Returns:
the ExternalState object associated with the URI, or null if none found
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

saveExternalState

void saveExternalState(IRestExternalState externalState)
                       throws InteropClientException
Save a new or modified ExternalState object. If the ExternalState object is associated with an ExternalProxy object, then incoming synchronization will be triggered.

Parameters:
externalState - the ExternalState object to save; must not be null; may be a new or modified item
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getSyncRule

IRestSyncRule getSyncRule(IRestSyncRule syncRule)
                          throws InteropClientException
Get the latest state of a SyncRule object, given a previously-fetched state.

Parameters:
syncRule - a previously-fetched SyncRule object; must not be null
Returns:
the latest state of the SyncRule object from the server; never null
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getSyncRule

IRestSyncRule getSyncRule(IRestExternalProxy externalProxy)
                          throws InteropClientException
Get the SyncRule object associated with an ExternalProxy object, if any.

Parameters:
externalProxy - the ExternalProxy object to get the associated SyncRule object for; must have been previously fetched from the server
Returns:
the associated SyncRule object, or null if none
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getAllSyncRules

java.util.List getAllSyncRules()
                               throws InteropClientException
Get all SyncRule objects in the repository.

Returns:
a list of SyncRule objects; never null; may be empty
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

findSyncRule

IRestSyncRule findSyncRule(java.lang.String name)
                           throws InteropClientException
Find a SyncRule object by name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the SyncRule object to find; must not be null or empty
Returns:
the found SyncRule object, or null if none
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

findSyncRulesForExternalType

java.util.List findSyncRulesForExternalType(java.lang.String externalTypeName,
                                            java.lang.String projectAreaId)
                                            throws InteropClientException
Find all SyncRule objects with a given external type name property and/or that are associated with a particular project area. At least one of the externalTypeName or projectAreaId arguments must be specified.

Parameters:
externalTypeName - a pattern for the external type name to search for; '%' will match any substring and '_' will match any character; if null or empty, all type names match
projectAreaId - the item identifier of the project area that the synchronization rules should be associated with; if null or empty, all project areas match
Returns:
the list of found SyncRule objects; never null; may be empty
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

storeContent

IInteropContent storeContent(java.lang.String contentType,
                             java.lang.String characterEncoding,
                             java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                             long length,
                             long checksum)
                             throws InteropClientException
Create new Content object. After creation, the "value" of the content descriptor can be sent as a property value by encoding it using the IInteropContent.encodeDescriptor() method.

Parameters:
contentType - the MIME type of the content; must not be null
characterEncoding - the character set of the content; must not be null
inputStream - an input stream for the content
length - the number of bytes in the content; must not be negative
checksum - the checksum for the content; must be computed using the Adler32 class
Returns:
the new Content object, representing unclaimed content in the Jazz repository. The content must be claimed by sending the encoded content descriptor as a property value for some item that will store a reference to the content.
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

getProjectArea

IInteropProjectAreaDTO getProjectArea(IRestSyncRule syncRule)
                                      throws InteropClientException
Get the project area associated with a sync rule, if any.

Parameters:
syncRule - the sync rule to get the project area for; must have previously been fetched from the server
Returns:
the associated project area object, or null if none
Throws:
InteropClientException - Thrown on any error

checkLicense

void checkLicense(java.lang.String operationId)
                  throws InteropClientException
Check that an operation is allowed by the server and user licenses.

Parameters:
operationId - the name of the operation to license check
Throws:
InteropNotLicensedException - if the operation is not allowed because the client user is not licensed
InteropClientException - if there was a failure in checking for licensed operation
